CAMBRIDGE , Mass. -- GOP Sen. Jeff Flake gave some of his harshest criticism of President Donald Trump to date in a commencement speech Wednesday to [ARGM-LOC: Harvard Law students] , [R-ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG0: he] [V: shared] [ARG1: his concerns for the integrity of politics in the United States] .
